title: Forum Features and Feedback
content:
This is where you can give us any suggestions to improve the forums, or ask any other related questions.

Some rules

  • Please be patient for new features to be added. We are humans, not machines.
  • For technical issues, contact the devs through thehelp page.
shortDesc: Feel free to post any questions you have about the forum, or suggestions on how we can improve.

title: Forum Rules
shortDesc: Please read our forum rules before posting or commenting!
content:
Welcome toLevelUpLounge, your corner for video games and more!

  • As much as possible, keep your posts and comments related to video games and any other similar topics. Unrelated topics such as religion, politics, etc. may be removed.
  • Users are not allowed to disclose personal information for their own safety. Revealing another user’s personal information will merit apermanent banfor those involved.
  • Do not harass any other forum users, including moderators and other staff. It’s okay to express your opinion, but keep it civil.
  • Hate speech is not permitted. Posting or commenting about hate speech will result in apermanent ban.
  • Refrain from bumping up threads just for the sake of it. Non-productive comments not related to the topic at hand will be removed.
  • Self-promotion of personal products, materials, etc. is not allowed. Posts containing such content will be edited or deleted.
  • Illegal activity such as piracy is not allowed.
  • Linking to files which contain viruses or malware will result in apermanent ban.
